title: A Diasporic Youth
name: A Diasporic Youth
description:
A Map by Dhale

Places I have lived

properties.name: 1- Jeff Anderson Regional Medical Center, Meridian, MS
properties.description: Posted by Dhale2124 14 st, meridian, ms, 39301This is where I was born. I lived there for 8 days.

properties.name: 10- Mamaw's
properties.description: Posted by Dhale1913 Upper Rhineheart Rd, Dandridge, TNWe lived here while our house was being built.

properties.name: 11,15- Current Residence
properties.description: Posted by Dhale918 Hales Haven Way, Dandridge, TN

properties.name: 12- TTU
properties.description: Posted by DhaleCookeville, TNLived here while attending TTU.

properties.name: 13- The Cumberland, Nashville, TN
properties.description: Posted by DhaleLived here while on internship in Nashville, TN, at the State Legislature.

properties.name: 14- Melrose Hall, UTK
properties.description: Posted by DhaleLived here while finishing my degree.

properties.name: 2- Newton, MS
properties.description: Posted by Dhale508, scanlan,Newton, MS 39345This is the location of the Alumni Office at the college where Dad taught, it no longer exists and I was not sure where we lived in Newton.

properties.name: 3- Montgomery
properties.description: Posted by Dhale 215 Perry Hill RoadThis is where Dad worked, not sure where in Montgomery we lived.

properties.name: 4- Des Moines, IA
properties.description: Posted by Dhale 3600 30th StreetThis is where Dad worked in Des Moines. Not sure where we lived except that it was in front of a set of railroad tracks.

properties.name: 4- Prattville
properties.description: Posted by DhaleThis is the second time Dad worked at the Montgomery, Al, hospital. This time we lived in Prattville.

properties.name: 5- Dublin, GA
properties.description: Posted by Dhale109 oasis dr, dublin, gaThis is right on the edge of "VooDoo Country"

properties.name: 6- Mountain Home 1
properties.description: Posted by DhaleFirst House at Mountain Home, which is a Federal installation inside Johnson City, TN.

properties.name: 7- Mountain Home 2
properties.description: Posted by DhaleSecond House at Mountain Home, which is a Federal installation inside Johnson City, TN.

properties.name: 8- Hot Springs 1
properties.description: Posted by DhaleFirst House in Hot Springs, SD. This town had a population of about 5,000 and was created to house the employees of the VA Hospital. The hospital was created because of the hot springs of the Fall River. This town hosts The Mammoth Site, a permanent archeological dig, and Evan\'s Plunge, the largest naturally fed indoor warm water pool in the world.

properties.name: 9- Hot Springs 2
properties.description: Posted by DhaleSecond House in Hot Springs, SD. This town had a population of about 5,000 and was created to house the employees of the VA Hospital. The hospital was created because of the hot springs of the Fall River. This town hosts The Mammoth Site, a permanent archeological dig, and Evan\'s Plunge, the largest naturally fed indoor warm water pool in the world.
